resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
kou opened a new pull request, #13003:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13003

   We should replace this with real verification such as running tests
   against the built .jars later.
   
   See also: ARROW-15486

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #13003:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13003#issuecomment-1110269618

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

kou commented on PR #13003:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13003#issuecomment-1110343691

   Verification for 8.0.0 is failed as expected because we don't upload Java artifacts for 8.0.0 yet.
   Verification for 7.0.0 isn't failed as expected because we have uploaded Java artifacts for 7.0.0.

kszucs closed pull request #13003: ARROW-16332: [Release][Java] Add artifacts uploaded verification
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13003

ursabot commented on PR #13003:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13003#issuecomment-1115749064
